All Classes

Class Description
BackEndExternalAPI
Classes that implement this interface are meant to be passed around the front end in order to call the appropriate methods on the back end
BackEndInternalAPI
This interface is not meant to be implemented by any specific class.
BasicPieceTest
Testing class for piece creation, reflection for various piece components, and basic testing of getAllPossibleMoves
Board  
BoardRestriction  
Coordinate
Used to represent coordinate values.
Creator
Meant to be extended by creators to make different components of the game.
Display  
Engine
Implemented by any type of game engine that is designed to run a specific type of program.
EngineInitializer
each method here will pass the file name to the file parser, then the relevant information to the classloader to load the class details
ExceptionHandler
Used to make errors that can be caught
FileParser
This interface will be used to parse JSON files for all types of games
FiniteJump
This movement class represents a piece that can travel over other pieces, but only for a specified number of spaces
FiniteSlide
This movement class represents a move that can travel an finite number of spaces in a certain direction.
FloatingWindow  
FrontEndExternalAPI
Classes that implement this interface are meant to be passed around the back end in order to call the appropriate methods on the front end
FrontEndInternalAPI
This interface is not meant to be implemented by any specific class.

GamePiece
Represents a generic game piece.
GameRules  
GameScene  
GameSceneFactory
Creates GameScene subclasses, however returns the general GameScene object rather than the concrete subclass.
GameWindow
The top level UI element of the game.
GameWindowFactory

GeneralRestriction  
InfiniteJump  
InfiniteSlide
This movement class represents a move that can travel an infinite number of spaces in a certain direction.
Initializer
This interface will be used to initialize all types of games.
Loader  
Main
This is the class that is run to instantiate the front and back end, and link them together

Feel free to completely change this code or delete it entirely.

PieceCreator
This class is used to coordinate the creation of pieces, starting from parsing through the XML file and then going on to use reflection to compose the pieces
PieceMovement
This class is used to represent a singular move that a piece can do.
